title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.2 - Renewals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.2 - Renewals

State Regulations
(a) At least 60 days prior to the termination
of the period of validity of an operating certificate, the facility shall
refile an application for the renewed issuance of such operating
certificate. (b) This section shall
not be applicable to any facility operated by an authorized agency, as such
term is defined in section 371.10(a) of the Social Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
477.2

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
